channel.title: When I add someone to friends and then log out and I cant log back in!
channel.description: Hi. My friends list works 100% but when I log out with people on the list I cant log back in. I have to go and delete them manually from my character file. This is really annoying. How can I make this not happen?

item.title: When I add someone to friends and then log out and I cant log back in!
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

I’ve done too much to my source to get rid of it. I want better ideas than “Get a better source”.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 12:14:31 PM[/size][hr]The help section sucks

Read full topic
